short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save your open tabs as a workspace.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever wanted to save your open tabs while you are doing a research or while working on a project to come back later?
If your answer is yes, then try this extension. It will be useful to you.
